name: Arrival (SANDBOXGames, INotAntonio, BargainBin2, MMoutafis95, Stepford)
description:
Don't Stop Running! You play as an android who has recently escaped after becoming sentient. Nowhere to go,  Nowhere to hide, All you can do is RUN!
Controls: Jump = Spacebar / Up Arrow / W  Credits Music Used: Arrival - By Indecisive https://indecisive-ari.bandcamp.com/album/arrival SFX made  or sourced from: Freesound.org https://freesound.org/ Developers: BargainBin2 - Character Design & Animation INotAntonio - UI & Main Menu MMoutafis95 - Game & Main Menu Design Stepford - Environment Design SANDBOXGames - Programming & Game Design Install Instructions:
  1. Download the Zip File
  2. Extract File
  3. Run .exe file
  4. Enjoy!
